name: SCAMPY'S mediocre quest
description:
Scampy is the Mandrake Queen. This skinny legend keeps watch over her people and does what she needs to do to protect them. However, it appears that some Mandrake seedlings escaped from the day care! Collect all the seedlings in order to win!

Controls:

Left: A

Right: D

Jump: W

Walljumping: A, W, D or D, W, A or W, A, D or W, D, A
